front.title: RECONFIGURE Triggered by DHCPv6 Relay Agents

abstract.t: This document defines a new DHCPv6 message type: RECONFIGURE-REQUEST. This message is sent by a DHCPv6 relay agent to notify a DHCPv6 server about a configuration information change, so that the DHCPv6 server can send a RECONFIGURE message accordingly. This document updates RFC3315 and RFC6422.
